text: While Apollos was in Corinth, Paul went through the inland regions and came to Ephesus. He found some disciples there

<st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Did you <st data-num="2983" class="">receive</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> when you <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st>?”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3588">They</st> replied,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="235">No</st>, we have <st data-num="3761">not even</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> that there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.”

<st data-num="5037" class="">So</st> Paul<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="1519">Into</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> were you <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st>?” “<st data-num="1519">Into</st> <st data-num="2491">John’s</st> <st data-num="908">baptism</st>,” they <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2491">John</st> <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> with a <st data-num="908" class="">baptism</st> of <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the one who was to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.”

When they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, they were <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2007" class="">placed</st><n id="1" /> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> on <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">upon</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, and they began to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="1100" class="">tongues</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="4395" class="">prophesy</st>.<n id="4" />
(Now there were about twelve men in all.)
So Paul entered the synagogue and spoke out fearlessly for three months, addressing and convincing them about the kingdom of God.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">when</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> were <st data-num="4645" class="">stubborn</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="544">refused to believe</st>, <st data-num="2551" class="">reviling</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3598" class="">Way</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="4128" class="">congregation</st>, he <st data-num="868" class="">left</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and <st data-num="873" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> with him,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="1256" class="">addressing</st><n id="7" /> them <st data-num="2596" class="">every</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st><n id="8" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4981">lecture hall</st><n id="9" /> of <st data-num="5181" class="">Tyrannus</st>.
This went on for two years, so that all who lived in the province of Asia, both Jews and Greeks, heard the word of the Lord.
God was performing extraordinary miracles by Paul’s hands,

<st data-num="5620" class="">so that</st> when <st data-num="2532">even</st> <st data-num="4676" class="">handkerchiefs</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4612" class="">aprons</st> that had touched <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5559" class="">body</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="667" class="">brought</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="770" class="">sick</st>, their <st data-num="3554" class="">diseases</st> <st data-num="525" class="">left</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st> <st data-num="1607">went out</st> of them.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="4022" class="">itinerant</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="1845" class="">exorcists</st> tried to <st data-num="2021" class="">invoke</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> those who were <st data-num="2192" class="">possessed</st> by<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirits</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “I <st data-num="3726">sternly warn</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> by <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="2784" class="">preaches</st>.”

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of a <st data-num="5100" class="">man</st> named<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4630" class="">Sceva</st>, a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="749">high priest</st>, were <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st>.)<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> about <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I am <st data-num="1987" class="">acquainted</st> with<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?”<n id="4" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3739">who</st> was <st data-num="1510" class="">possessed</st> by<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="2177" class="">jumped</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> and <st data-num="2634" class="">beat</st> <st data-num="297">them all</st> <st data-num="2634">into submission</st>.<n id="3" /> He <st data-num="2480" class="">prevailed</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5620">so that</st> they <st data-num="1628" class="">fled</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5135" class="">wounded</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="1110" class="">known</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="2730" class="">lived</st> in <st data-num="2181" class="">Ephesus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">both</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1672">Greeks</st>; <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="1968" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> was <st data-num="3170" class="">praised</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st> of those who had <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> <st data-num="2064">came forward</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1843" class="">confessing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="312" class="">making</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4234" class="">deeds</st> <st data-num="312" class="">known</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2425" class="">Large numbers</st><n id="1" /> of those who had <st data-num="4238" class="">practiced</st> <st data-num="4021" class="">magic</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4851" class="">collected</st> their <st data-num="976" class="">books</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="2618" class="">burned</st> them <st data-num="4860" class="">up</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">in the presence of</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st>.<n id="4" /> When<n id="5" /> the <st data-num="5092" class="">value</st> of the <st data-num="846" class="">books</st> was <st data-num="4860">added up</st>, it was <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> to total <st data-num="3461 4002">50,000</st> <st data-num="694">silver coins</st>.<n id="6" />
In this way the word of the Lord continued to grow in power and to prevail.
Now after all these things had taken place, Paul resolved to go to Jerusalem, passing through Macedonia and Achaia. He said, “After I have been there, I must also see Rome.”
So after sending two of his assistants, Timothy and Erastus, to Macedonia, he himself stayed on for a while in the province of Asia.
At that time a great disturbance took place concerning the Way.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="1216" class="">Demetrius</st>, a <st data-num="695" class="">silversmith</st> who <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> <st data-num="693" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="3485" class="">shrines</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="735" class="">Artemis</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3930" class="">brought</st> a <st data-num="3756 3641">great deal</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="2039" class="">business</st><n id="4" /> to the <st data-num="5079" class="">craftsmen</st>.

He <st data-num="4867" class="">gathered</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739">these</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4867" class="">together</st>, along with the <st data-num="2040" class="">workmen</st> <st data-num="5108">in similar trades</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="435">Men</st>, you <st data-num="1987" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2142" class="">prosperity</st><n id="4" /> comes <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2039" class="">business</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> you <st data-num="2334" class="">see</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> has <st data-num="3982" class="">persuaded</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="3179">turned away</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="2425" class="">large</st> <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3440" class="">only</st> in <st data-num="2181" class="">Ephesus</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> in <st data-num="4975" class="">practically</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of the province of <st data-num="773" class="">Asia</st>,<n id="5" /> by <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">gods</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">made</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">gods</st> at all.<n id="7" />

There is danger not only that this business of ours will come into disrepute, but also that the temple of the great goddess Artemis will be regarded as nothing, and she whom all the province of Asia and the world worship will suffer the loss of her greatness.”
When they heard this they became enraged and began to shout, “Great is Artemis of the Ephesians!”

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> was <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> with the <st data-num="4799" class="">uproar</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> the crowd<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3729" class="">rushed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2302" class="">theater</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3661" class="">together</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="4884">dragging with</st> them <st data-num="1050" class="">Gaius</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="708" class="">Aristarchus</st>, the <st data-num="3110" class="">Macedonians</st> who were <st data-num="3972">Paul’s</st> <st data-num="4898">traveling companions</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st> <st data-num="1014" class="">wanted</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="1218" class="">public assembly</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1439" class="">let</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Even</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="775">provincial authorities</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5384" class="">friends</st> <st data-num="3992">sent</st><n id="2" /> a message<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="3870" class="">urging</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="1325 1438">venture</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2302" class="">theater</st>.

<st data-num="3767">So then</st> <st data-num="243" class="">some</st> were <st data-num="2896" class="">shouting</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one thing</st>, some <st data-num="243" class="">another</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">assembly</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> in <st data-num="4797" class="">confusion</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">most</st> of them did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="5101 1752">why</st> they had <st data-num="4905" class="">met together</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1537">Some of</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="4822" class="">concluded</st><n id="1" /> it was about<n id="2" /> <st data-num="223" class="">Alexander</st> because the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> had <st data-num="4261" class="">pushed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to the front.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="223" class="">Alexander</st>, <st data-num="2678" class="">gesturing</st><n id="4" /> with his <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st>, was <st data-num="2309" class="">wanting</st> to <st data-num="626">make a defense</st><n id="5" /> before the <st data-num="1218">public assembly</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when they <st data-num="1921" class="">recognized</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st>, they <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted</st> <st data-num="5456 3391">in unison</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3173">Great</st> is <st data-num="735" class="">Artemis</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="2180" class="">Ephesians</st>!” <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> <st data-num="5613">about</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hours</st>.<n id="4" />

After the <st data-num="1122">city secretary</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2687" class="">quieted</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, he <st data-num="5346" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="435">Men</st> of <st data-num="2180" class="">Ephesus</st>, <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> there <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> that the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of the <st data-num="2180" class="">Ephesians</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="3511">keeper<n id="3" /> of the temple</st> of the <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="735" class="">Artemis</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of her <st data-num="1356">image that fell from heaven</st>?<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> because <st data-num="3778">these facts</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="368">indisputable</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="2687" class="">keep quiet</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4238" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="4312" class="">reckless</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you have <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="435" class="">men</st> here who are <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="2417">temple robbers</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="987" class="">blasphemers</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">goddess</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> <st data-num="1216" class="">Demetrius</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5079" class="">craftsmen</st> who are <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="3056" class="">complaint</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st>, the <st data-num="60" class="">courts</st> <st data-num="71" class="">are open</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="446">proconsuls</st>; let them <st data-num="1458">bring charges against</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st> there.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="1934" class="">want</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> in addition,<n id="1" /> it will have to be <st data-num="1956" class="">settled</st><n id="2" /> in a <st data-num="1772" class="">legal</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">assembly</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> we <st data-num="2793">are in danger</st> of being <st data-num="1458" class="">charged</st> with <st data-num="4714" class="">rioting</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st>, since there <st data-num="5225" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3367">no</st> <st data-num="159" class="">cause</st> we <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="591" class="">give</st> to <st data-num="3056" class="">explain</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4963">disorderly gathering</st>.”<n id="4" />
After he had said this, he dismissed the assembly.
